articles.title: Dyson job cuts: One third of vacuum company's UK workforce to go - BBC.com
articles.description: The firm, known for the invention of the bag-less vacuum cleaner, made the announcement in response to global markets.
articles.content:
By Emma Elgee & Michael Race, Reporter & business reporter, BBC News
Sir James Dyson founded the firm in 1991

articles.author: Giacomo Tognini
articles.title: Billionaire Harvard Professor's Fortune Jumps Nearly $200 Million On News Of Eli Lilly Biotech Deal - Forbes
articles.description: Shares of biotech firm Morphic Holding, founded by Harvard immunologist Tim Springer, rocketed up 75% Monday after Eli Lilly said it would snap it up for $3.2 billion.
